snippet.title: Jump on the Ball - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Download now on Itch! (any donations go straight to studio funding for our next game)
https://litnoth.itch.io/jump-on-the-ball

Join our DISCORD for updates on our next game!
https://discord.com/invite/VRxnqj6Puy

About
Meet Greg. A 35 year old man trying to find balance in his life for even just five seconds. We play in Greg's dream where he reconnects with an old toy ball his father threw in the trash when he was 12. While his father was trying to teach Greg a lesson, unfortunately, all it taught Greg was profound sadness and that sometimes you can't trust even the people you love most.

Can you beat all THREE levels?!

Try and balance on the ball for more than FIVE seconds!

Literally Nothing Socials:
Instagram: https://instagram.com/literally_____nothing
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/VRxnqj6Puy
